name: Epic Toy Army Battle
description:
Get ready for this ultimate toy soldiers battle being a commander of the real toy army! Have the huge battlefield in front of the modern nursery room and break your enemy! Many exciting fights are waiting for the most skillful specialist on tactics, strategy and, of course, army commanding! Check our new amazing Epic Toy Army Battle game and rule the whole toy army!

Unleash your fury fighting with the opposite army of toy soldiers - and take your territories away! Check two types of fascinating armies and choose the best one to join! Mind that every unit has its special skills and abilities, so be careful and attentive making the placements for your troops! Remember the rule: the medical support member shouldn't be in the first row!

Win all the battles one by one and get some points for each victory to enlarge your army units - make the greatest decisions ever! Just decide, where every soldier must be placed and choose the best tactics to win your crafty opponent - it's as skillful as you are, we're sure! Check our new fascinating Epic Toy Army Battle and just enjoy its gameplay!

Watch the armies fighting from above, tap the screen to control the situation and just do everything possible to decrease the number of losses - every unit is precious at war! Become the bravest toy army commander ever and just enjoy this ultimate possibility! Join this epic battle simulator made for all lovers of toy soldiers, army gun strikes, fighting battleship tiger and other games!

Epic Toy Army Battle features:
• Stunning simulation of toy epic battlefield
• Different toy soldier units to control
• Chance to power tactics and strategy skills up
• Various unlockable locations and units
• Colorful 3D toy world

Learn more about tactics and strategy and defeat all these enemy's soldiers on your way playing Epic Toy Army Battle game!
